contents.text: Welcome to Joyent in San Francisco, your partner for true multi-cloud Kubernetes and premier Node.js solutions.
To learn about our multi-cloud Kubernetes platform, press 1.
To connect with our technical sales team for Kubernetes deployments, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to Kubernetes technical sales.

navigationGoals: Get pricing and deployment options for Joyent’s multi-cloud Kubernetes offering.
I’d like to speak to sales about a multi-cloud Kubernetes deployment plan.
Discuss multi-cloud Kubernetes architecture options and get detailed pricing
I would like assistance planning my Kubernetes setup.
I’m looking for academic pricing and architecture guidance to run my physics simulations on a multi-cloud Kubernetes setup

contents.text: For Kubernetes support and troubleshooting, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to Kubernetes support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot my existing Kubernetes cluster issues.
I need to troubleshoot and get support for my Kubernetes cluster.
Troubleshoot a failing Kubernetes ingress controller after the latest platform update
My Kubernetes cluster isn’t working and I need technical help.
I need help troubleshooting a failing node autoscaling issue in my Kubernetes cluster

contents.text: To access our Node.js support and developer tools, press 2.
To speak with our Node.js support engineers, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Node.js support engineer.

navigationGoals: Debug a production error with a Node.js support engineer.
I want to connect with a Node.js engineer to debug my application.
Diagnose a memory leak in my Node.js production service
I need someone to help me troubleshoot my Node.js application.
I want support debugging a memory leak in my Node.js class project

contents.text: For Node.js professional services and consulting, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to Node.js professional services.

navigationGoals: Arrange a Node.js professional services consultation for my project.
I’m looking for professional services to optimize and scale my Node.js application.
Engage consultants to optimize my Node.js microservices deployment strategy
I want to speak with an expert about hiring help for my Node.js project.
I’d like professional consulting on optimizing my Node.js app for real-time data processing
